title: Veteran except his gun was confiscated so he uses a Flare Gun as an alternative

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - During the day, you may go on alert tonight. (2 uses)

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- At night, if a player chooses to visit you, you will shoot a flare into the air. This will alert Town of a flare coming from your home.
- This flare is processed immediately, meaning the flare is shot in the middle of the night as soon as a player chooses to target you.
- You only lose a charge if you shoot your flare that night.
- A Town Protective must exist for this role to spawn.
